CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Gel permeation chromatography ( GPC ) analysis showed that PBDT-TDPP-S has a numberaverage molecular weight ( M n ) of 1.34 × 10^4 g mol^-1 with a polydispersity index of 1.27 ( Figure S1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |
| numberaverage molecular weight (Mn) |

Explanation:

The material names in the paragraph are "PBDT-TDPP-S" and "numberaverage molecular weight (Mn)". "PBDT-TDPP-S" is a type of material that underwent gel permeation chromatography (GPC) analysis. "Numberaverage molecular weight (Mn)" is a property of the material that was measured during the analysis.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PBDT-TDPP-S |

Explanation:

The only material name in the paragraph is "PBDT-TDPP-S". "Numberaverage molecular weight (Mn)" is a property of the material, not the material itself. Therefore, it should not be included in the list of material names.
